WorkItem.Description:
The source code published isn't update to date, so I didn't want to make a diff, it would be too confusing. Hopefully the below makes sense.


__Resources\Resources.en.rex__
```
CommandSended	Command sent.	
FailedToConnect	Failed to Connect.	
FailedToConnectToServer	Failed to connect to the server.	
FinishedPublishing	Successfully Published	
```

Normally I wouldn't touch the French area, but the tense of the "name" should be changed globally.

__Resources\Resources.fr.rex__
```
CommandSent	Commande envoyÃ©e.	
FailedToConnect	Echec de connexion.	
FailedToConnectToServer	Echec de connexion au serveur.	
```

__frmRemoteExecution.cs__

```
row.Cells["Result"].Value = resMan.GetString("CommandSended");
--
row.Cells["Result"].Value = resMan.GetString("CommandSent");
```

```
if (MessageBox.Show(resMan.GetString("CredentialFailed"), resMan.GetString("FailToConnect"), MessageBoxButtons.YesNo) == System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult.No)
--
if (MessageBox.Show(resMan.GetString("CredentialFailed"), resMan.GetString("FailedToConnect"), MessageBoxButtons.YesNo) == System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult.No)
```

__frmWsusPackagePublisher.cs__
```
MessageBox.Show(this, resMan.GetString("FailToConnectToServer"));
--
MessageBox.Show(this, resMan.GetString("FailedToConnectToServer"));
```

These don't appear to be in resources in the published source code, might be now, but the spelling is wrong on additional and Approval is untranslated
. 
__UserControl\UpdateDetailViewer.cs__
```
label1.text -> Additional Information URL : 
dgvComputerStatus-> Approbation -> Approval
```
